description: Retrieves the definition of a specified database.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the database to retrieve. For Hive compatibility, this should be all lowercase.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the database. For Hive compatibility, this is folded to lowercase when it is stored.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A description of the database.

nested_items.name: LocationUri
nested_items.description: The location of the database (for example, an HDFS path).

nested_items.name: Parameters
nested_items.description: These key-value pairs define parameters and properties of the database.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: CreateTime
nested_items.description: The time at which the metadata database was created in the catalog.

nested_items.name: CreateTableDefaultPermissions
nested_items.description: Creates a set of default permissions on the table for principals. Used by Lake Formation. Not used in the normal course of Glue operations.

nested_items.name: Principal
nested_items.description: The principal who is granted permissions.

nested_items.name: DataLakePrincipalIdentifier
nested_items.description: An identifier for the Lake Formation principal.

nested_items.name: Permissions
nested_items.description: The permissions that are granted to the principal.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: TargetDatabase
nested_items.description: A DatabaseIdentifier structure that describes a target database for resource linking.

nested_items.name: CatalogId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Data Catalog in which the database resides.

nested_items.name: DatabaseName
nested_items.description: The name of the catalog database.

nested_items.name: Region
nested_items.description: Region of the target database.

nested_items.name: CatalogId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Data Catalog in which the database resides.

nested_items.name: FederatedDatabase
nested_items.description: A FederatedDatabase structure that references an entity outside the Glue Data Catalog.

nested_items.name: Identifier
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for the federated database.

nested_items.name: ConnectionName
nested_items.description: The name of the connection to the external metastore.
